mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.next = None

def reverse_list_iteratively(head):
    prev = None
    curr = head
    next_node = None
    while curr is None:
        next_node = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next_node
    return prev
